text:
Release date
July 2024
Question asked
How should the sentence ‘associated with activities in high-impact sectors’ be understood? Does
it exclusively refer to the sectors in which the reporting undertaking itself operates?
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 121 of 278
ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
ESRS reference
ESRS E1 paragraphs 38, 40 and AR 36 (c); ESRS 2 paragraphs 40 (b), 40 (c) and AR 13
Key terms
Impact sectors
